item.title: ControlMLLM: Training-Free Visual Prompt Learning for Multimodal Large Language Models
item.description: ControlMLLM: Inject visual prompts into MLLMs via learnable latent variable optimization for training-free referring abilities, supporting box, mask, scribble, and point prompts.
